thread.title: Curt (Central Texas)

author: Curt (Central Texas)
title: Curt (Central Texas)
text: These bulbs are just what we needed. The color works very well with our home style which is "Texas Tuscan". It's sort of a yellowy amber but very subtle. Very pleased that these bulbs don't use much energy at all but are pretty bright. In fact, each of our lanterns has a place for 4 bulbs but we currently only use 2 bulbs in each. The bulbs themselves are a little tacky to the touch but I'm assuming this is the coating that gives them the yellowy amber color.
